item.description: Full credit to Russell Ivanovic for his tweet for figuring out how to disable Xcode 8’s extremely chatty debug console logging. I just wanted this here for my own reference, but perhaps it’s helpful to you as well. If you’re tired of sifting through operating system-level logging to the debug console while you’re debugging your app, it’s actually fairly easy to silence. Jump to… Edit the scheme for your app Add a new environment variable for OS_ACTIVITY_MODE Was this article helpful?
